short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces new tab with an 'one day you'll die' concept.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The concept involves replacing the new tab page in a browser with a reminder that "One day you'll die." This message could serve as a reflection on the fleeting nature of life, possibly encouraging users to make the most of their time, prioritize meaningful activities, or live more consciously.

A real-time counter or age calculator could be included to show the user's age, the passage of time, or other life-related metrics, reinforcing the message of mortality. The idea behind it seems to blend dark humor or existential thought with productivity or mindfulness.

This concept could either be a minimalist design with only text and basic information or a more interactive experience that continuously updates with personal data (like the userâ€™s age) to drive the reminder further.
